vclaim: In late March 2021, Republican Sen. Cindy Hyde-Smith expressed the opinion that voting on Sunday is wrong because it’s the Sabbath and dedicated to God.
title: Did Sen. Cindy Hyde-Smith Say There Shouldn’t Be Voting on Sunday Because of the Sabbath?
subtitle: Democrats criticized state legislatures for developing new laws that they said disenfranchised voters of color.
author: Nur Ibrahim
